DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , placebo-controlled , randomize , double-blind , dose-escalation study evaluate safety , tolerability , PK single oral ( PO ) administration PCO371 healthy adult male . Caucasian Japanese subject randomize receive either PCO371 placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Ascending Dose Study PCO371 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 18 45 year . Caucasian ( BMI 1830 mg/kg2 ) first generation japanese ( BMI 1825kg/m2 ) Able willing abide protocol Evidence medical condition could affect renal , hepatic , cardiopulmonary function .
